meanings.sent1: The table had a varnishy shine.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a varnishy finish on the painting.
meanings.sent3: The varnishy smell of the furniture made the room feel like a workshop.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as varnishy as a freshly polished floor.
meanings.sent5: The varnishy texture of the wood made it smooth to the touch.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of varnish.
meanings.sent1: The old book had a varnishy cover.
meanings.sent2: The varnishy surface of the table reflected the light beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The varnishy taste of the sauce surprised her taste buds.
meanings.sent4: His words had a varnishy quality, making them sound insincere.
meanings.sent5: The varnishy appearance of the car made it look brand new.
